CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 1, 1953, pg. 7, reads: "Baptizing in Penn Township - Many came to the pool to be baptized in an old-fashioned outdoor ceremony at the First United Holy Church in Penn Township Sunday, July 26. Elder Walter R. Shields, standing on the edge of the pool, raises a hymn as the candidate emerges from the water.  Elder C. J. Nickolson of Selma, Ala., preached; Elder Irene Jackson is minister in charge.  The scene of happy worshipers surrounding the baptismal pool brings fond memories to others who passed this way. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Elder Walter R. Shields and baptismal candidates, possibly including Luvenia Watts second from left, posed behind outdoor pool, First United Holy Church, Penn Township
